Name: Legion 51
About the game: TOP SECRET FILE: THE STORM OF AREA 51 - 20/09/2019 BURN AFTER PLAYING! Lead your army of fans through the defense posts of Area 51 military base. Could you be the best raid leader among your friends? Or maybe you’re the chosen one – Natural Born Legion Commander? Are you ready to accept the challenge? Run against different types of soldiers that become stronger the closer you are to Area 51 base. Place your forces effectively on the field to create invincible echelons. Spend hype points to strengthen your Legion, combine units with different perks to create chemistry on the battlefield. Catch the MLG moment to crush enemies with your special ability timing. Watch them run, watch them fall - have fun! There are just a few things you can watch forever: fire, water, and thousands of crazy fans falling while trying to raid highly guarded top-secret military facility with bare hands.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Legion 51? Check out the release date (Nov 20, 2019), developer insights from Nik Zayne, and a complete game summary.
